response:
"warum gibt es noch immer unternehmen, die unser persönliches daten sammeln und missbrauchen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and misuse our personal data? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and misuse personal data, highlighting the importance of data protection, privacy, and security. the use of hashtags such as #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) allows the post to reach a wider audience and connect with others who are interested in this topic.
